alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 3:01AM MST until December 25 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 15 inches, with locally higher amounts up to 18 inches around Park City to Kamas. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Wasatch Back. * WHEN...From 6 AM today to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The period of heaviest snowfall is expected this evening through Friday morning, and could impact peak holiday travel times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
